text:
When I have the Apache Service Monitor open I am unable to right click on taskbar items. When I do they simple blink "active" instead of giving me the normal context "Restore/Move/Size/Minimize/Maximize/Close" menu. I've tested this several times and can reproduce the bug.

Trivial, silly, but still a bug. :)

Cheers.
creator: jbleau@gmail.com

text:
I cannot reproduce this with 2.2.14 on Windows XP Professional SP3.

I have full interraction with the system tray while the Apache Service Monitor is open.
creator: m.watts@eris.qinetiq.com
